attributes.action: Capital punishment to be reinstated for all child murderers,which have been committed intentionally
attributes.additional_details:
It is about time that the Government Now reinstated Capital Punishment For all child murderers that commit there heinous crimes against poor,defenceless innocent children.
The laws in this country are to soft in many cases & it is now time for the people of this country to stand up against all of these sick individuals & ask the Government to now make a strong stance against the mentioned sick individuals. Instead of spending tens of thousands pounds of the tax payers money to keep them every year in a secure environment for the rest of there lives.
& Human Rights do not come in to such crimes as they never thought of there poor defencless victims Human Rights when committing these heinous crimes.
There lives were ripped away from them before they even properly began. So now lets all join together, make a stance & do the RIGHT THING & SIGN!!!!
